item.title: Google Certified Professional Cloud Architect
item.description: Today I passed my exam to become Google Certified Professional Cloud Architect! Glad that’s out the way, and I can now focus on building the practice at Neudesic.

item.title: I'm joining Neudesic to build a Google Cloud team
item.description: I’ve decided to accept a new challenge, and join the Neudesic team. I’m to be their new Director, Google Cloud, helping to build a team ready to work on Google Cloud Platform projects. Wish me luck!
